TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 285,000 to 300,000 head versus 292,000 week ago and 309,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 125,000 to 131,000 head versus 129,000 week ago and 119,000 a year ago. Reuter
